ygData.subject: Is this the end for Ignatius?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ignatius closes his talons barely missing Drillbit. moments later multiple shots from all sides hit him hard. Drillbits gattling gun, along with Kali, Luzbel,

Subject: Is this the end for Ignatius?

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Ignatius closes his talons barely missing Drillbit. moments later multiple
shots from all sides hit him hard. Drillbits gattling gun, along with Kali,
Luzbel, and Attillas weapons put hole after hole in the bots frame.

"I must remain airborn." he said wincing in pain every time his wings
flapped. A sudden shot ripped through his wing sending him into a tailspin.
If not for Slayers quick reactions he'd have slammed into the desert below.
He tried to fire his optics but had lost to much energeon to sustain a
blast. He forced himself to raise a wing and aim a missle but found he
barely had the strength left to lift it. His wing collapsed back to his side
as the Trainer lost consciousness.
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, June 25, 2001 11:49 AM
Subject: Killfest


> Forgot to post with my Preds. I'm pretty sure the Trainer base did
> explode. I vaugely remember reading that. Anyways, if it didn't,
> forget this post.
>
> ::Killfest/EndBringer/Demise/Scyther/Incarcinator/Neody/Crater/Slayer
> ::
>
> Killfest and his group were far enough from the Trainer base when it
> exploded for the blast not to be fatal, but it sent all of them
> flying. Demise and EndBringer go into stasis lock, the rest of them
> staying concious and beginning to get up.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Neody watches the base explode, his link with his two pods that he'd
> sent being severed as they were vaporized. The ground under his feet
> shakes, making him fall backwards.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Crater dives down on the ground as the Trainer base explodes, debris
> flying over him, lots of it digging painfully into his back, severing
> his spine. The damage war repairabe, though.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Slayer growls, turning around as Ignatius calls him a coward to see
> the other Trainer being pummeled heavily by weaponfire. He sighs and
> flies down toward him, transforming into beast mode and concentrating
> on approaching him so he could grab him with his feet.
>
>
>
